message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $12000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $9000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market price.

I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $10800. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I think it's still a great deal for you.

I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9000, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I've already made significant concessions. I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to make one final offer, so I'm counteroffering at $10500. This is the absolute lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
